From: uince1981 <uince1981@...>

nt: Thu, April 7, 2011 12:02:36 PM
Subject: [junit] Is stress test with jun=
it possible?

  
Hi, I'm new to java and Junit, I need to stress test a set=
 of web services, now 
for each web service I have a test like this: 


@Te=
st
public void webServiceTest() {
Integer firstParameter=3D0;
Integer secon=
dParameter=3D9;
List<GeoArea> sampleList =3D kitDAO.myWebServiceToTest(firs=
tParameter, 
secondParameter);
Assert.assertNotNull(sampleList);
Assert.ass=
ertTrue(sampleList.size() > 0);
}

Is there a way to call this test 100 tim=
e simultaneously with different 
parameters? I would create 100 thread, pas=
s to them 100 different set of 
parameters and start the thread simultaneou=
sly. Do you think this is possible? 
How would you do it?
